overview: The plot runs around a young man Suka of Buguda, a village in Ganjam District. Who is a film buff and a die-hard fan of Amitabh Bachhan? To brush off his body-shaming he tries to imitate his screen idol and recreates the magic of the iconic movie “SHOLAY” with some real-life adaptations.
title: Suka Bhaira Sholay
